AdministrixMod:BlueCloak.NAME: Blue Cloak
AdministrixMod:BlueCloak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard 1 card. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:Daybreak.NAME: Daybreak
AdministrixMod:Daybreak.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Yang. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:CrackingPangu.NAME: Cracking Pangu
AdministrixMod:CrackingPangu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every three times you play any Cracking Pangu(+) this combat, remove all of your Debuffs.

AdministrixMod:DiversionaryTactic.NAME: Diversion Tactic
AdministrixMod:DiversionaryTactic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard 1 card. NL Retain your hand this turn.

AdministrixMod:ExtolVirtue.NAME: Extol Virtue
AdministrixMod:ExtolVirtue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have any Artifact, gain !M! more.

AdministrixMod:ImmortalGrace.NAME: Immortal Grace
AdministrixMod:ImmortalGrace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Upgrade all Immortal cards in your hand for the rest of this combat. [#cc99ff]}[]
AdministrixMod:ImmortalGrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Upgrade all of your Immortal cards for the rest of this combat. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:NoblePath.NAME: Noble Path
AdministrixMod:NoblePath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E]. NL Gain !M! Yin. NL Gain !M! Yang.
AdministrixMod:NoblePath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E]. NL Gain !M! Yin twice. NL Gain !M! Yang twice.

AdministrixMod:PassageOfAges.NAME: Passage Of Ages
AdministrixMod:PassageOfAges.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Yin. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Add a Nightfall to your hand. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:PlateOfAntiquity.NAME: Plate Of Antiquity
AdministrixMod:PlateOfAntiquity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Lose !M! Dexterity at the end of this turn.

AdministrixMod:RebukeDesires.NAME: Rebuke Desires
AdministrixMod:RebukeDesires.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !M! Artifact.
AdministrixMod:RebukeDesires.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !M! Artifact.

AdministrixMod:RegentEdict.NAME: Regent's Edict
AdministrixMod:RegentEdict.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play any Regent's Edict(+) three times this combat, steal ALL of the enemy's Strength.

AdministrixMod:ShadowPlay.NAME: Shadow Play
AdministrixMod:ShadowPlay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Discard 1 card. NL Gain 4 Yin. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:ShadowPlay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Discard 1 card. NL Gain 4 Yin.

AdministrixMod:BegetEternity.NAME: Beget Eternity
AdministrixMod:BegetEternity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage thrice. NL Draw 1 additional card next turn. NL Gain !M! Affinity. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:ChooseYourEnd.NAME: Choose Your End
AdministrixMod:ChooseYourEnd.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Red Cloak and a Blue Cloak to your hand. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:FiendishCrimson.NAME: Fiendish Crimson
AdministrixMod:FiendishCrimson.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain 2 Frail. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:JustRewards.NAME: Just Rewards
AdministrixMod:JustRewards.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! Daybreaks to your hand.

AdministrixMod:NewWardrobe.NAME: New Wardrobe
AdministrixMod:NewWardrobe.DESCRIPTION: Swap your Yin and Yang. NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the difference between them.
AdministrixMod:NewWardrobe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap your Yang and Yin. NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to 4 + the difference between them.

AdministrixMod:ReachToHeaven.NAME: Reach to Heaven
AdministrixMod:ReachToHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Discard X cards. NL Deal !D! damage X times. NL Deal !D! to ALL enemies X times. NL Gain !M! Yang X times.

AdministrixMod:RisingSunPrince.NAME: Rising Sun's Prince
AdministrixMod:RisingSunPrince.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:SeventeenArticleLaser.NAME: 17-Article Laser
AdministrixMod:SeventeenArticleLaser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Transpose one.

AdministrixMod:UnstableVigor.NAME: Unstable Vigor
AdministrixMod:UnstableVigor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose !M! Strength at the end of this turn. NL Gain 1 Wilting.

AdministrixMod:WickedPunishment.NAME: Wicked Punishment
AdministrixMod:WickedPunishment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Gain 3 Yin !M! times.

AdministrixMod:GirlsDoItBetter.NAME: Girls Do It Better
AdministrixMod:GirlsDoItBetter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Enemy loses Strength equal to two-thirds of your Strength, rounded down. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:HaveItAll.NAME: Have It All
AdministrixMod:HaveItAll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Affinity. NL Discard 1 card.
AdministrixMod:HaveItAll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Gain !M! Affinity. NL Discard 1 card.

AdministrixMod:LifeforceNet.NAME: Lifeforce Net
AdministrixMod:LifeforceNet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Obtain 1 Fairy in a Bottle. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:NewbornDivinity.NAME: Newborn Divinity
AdministrixMod:NewbornDivinity.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the amount of Yang you have more of than Yin. NL Remove all of your Debuffs.

AdministrixMod:Schism.NAME: Schism
AdministrixMod:Schism.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half your Block to ALL enemies. NL Gain half your current Block next turn. NL Lose all Block.

AdministrixMod:RedCloak.NAME: Red Cloak
AdministrixMod:RedCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard 1 card. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:Nightfall.NAME: Nightfall
AdministrixMod:Nightfall.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Yin. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:CenturiesAscent.NAME: Centuries Ascent
AdministrixMod:CenturiesAscent.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Yang. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Add a Daybreak to your hand. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:ImmortalPurity.NAME: Immortal Purity
AdministrixMod:ImmortalPurity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Upgrade all Immortal cards in your hand for the rest of this combat. [#cc99ff]}[]
AdministrixMod:ImmortalPurity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Upgrade all of your Immortal cards for the rest of this combat. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:LightOfYourLife.NAME: Light of Your Life
AdministrixMod:LightOfYourLife.DESCRIPTION: Transpose one. NL Draw !M! card. NL Gain 4 Yang. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:LightOfYourLife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transpose one. NL Draw !M! card. NL Gain 4 Yang.

AdministrixMod:SealAway.NAME: Seal Away
AdministrixMod:SealAway.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of this combat. NL Discard your hand.

AdministrixMod:SipOfSparks.NAME: Sip of Sparks
AdministrixMod:SipOfSparks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose !M! Strength at the end of this turn.

AdministrixMod:SyncreticSurge.NAME: Syncretic Surge
AdministrixMod:SyncreticSurge.DESCRIPTION: Add a Daybreak to your hand for every Skill you've played this turn (including this one).
AdministrixMod:SyncreticSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Daybreak to your hand for every Skill you've played this turn (including this one).

AdministrixMod:SyncreticPlunge.NAME: Syncretic Plunge
AdministrixMod:SyncreticPlunge.DESCRIPTION: Add a Nightfall to your hand for every Attack you've played this turn.
AdministrixMod:SyncreticPlunge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Nightfall to your hand for every Attack you've played this turn.

AdministrixMod:TouchOfCinnabar.NAME: Touch of Cinnabar
AdministrixMod:TouchOfCinnabar.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Plated Armor. NL Gain 2 Frail. NL Gain !M! Artifact.

AdministrixMod:Transition.NAME: Transition
AdministrixMod:Transition.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. NL Gain [R] next turn. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Draw 1 additional card next turn. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:ArmillarySphere.NAME: Armillary Sphere
AdministrixMod:ArmillarySphere.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block next turn. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Gain !B! Block. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:BishamonBlessing.NAME: Bishamon's Blessing
AdministrixMod:BishamonBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Gain !M! Yang. NL Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. [#cc99ff]}[]
AdministrixMod:BishamonBlessing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Gain !M! Yang. NL Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:BloodlessSapphire.NAME: Bloodless Sapphire
AdministrixMod:BloodlessSapphire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain 2 Wilting. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:CosmosControl.NAME: Cosmos Control
AdministrixMod:CosmosControl.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Both cards cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:CosmosControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Both cards cost 0 until played.

AdministrixMod:DreamsMausoleum.NAME: Dreams Mausoleum
AdministrixMod:DreamsMausoleum.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: This card costs 1 [R] less this combat. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:FeastOfDew.NAME: Feast of Dew
AdministrixMod:FeastOfDew.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Whenever you play any Feast of Dew(+) three times this combat, gain 4 Affinity.
AdministrixMod:FeastOfDew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a copy of this card to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Whenever you play any Feast of Dew(+) three times this combat, gain 4 Affinity.

AdministrixMod:Grandeur.NAME: Grandeur
AdministrixMod:Grandeur.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !ax:M2! Dexterity. NL Lose !M! Strength and !ax:M2! Dexterity at the end of this turn. NL Draw 1 card.

AdministrixMod:GuanyinBlessing.NAME: Guanyin's Blessing
AdministrixMod:GuanyinBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Gain !M! Yin. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. [#cc99ff]}[]
AdministrixMod:GuanyinBlessing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Gain !M! Yin. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:Katabasis.NAME: Katabasis
AdministrixMod:Katabasis.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak X times. NL Add an upgraded Nightfall to your hand each turn for the next X turns.
AdministrixMod:Katabasis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak X+1 times. NL Add an upgraded Nightfall to your hand each turn for the next X+1 turns.

AdministrixMod:Metempsychosis.NAME: Metempsychosis
AdministrixMod:Metempsychosis.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] next turn. NL Draw 1 less card next turn. NL Gain 2 Duality. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:Metempsychosis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] next turn. NL Draw 1 less card next turn. NL Gain 2 Duality.

AdministrixMod:MixOfMercury.NAME: Mix of Mercury
AdministrixMod:MixOfMercury.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Thorns. NL Gain 2 Wilting. NL Gain !M! Artifact.

AdministrixMod:QuietConspiracy.NAME: Quiet Conspiracy
AdministrixMod:QuietConspiracy.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile, and discard any of them. NL Regardless, draw 2 cards.

AdministrixMod:Transcension.NAME: Transcension
AdministrixMod:Transcension.DESCRIPTION: Replay the last Attack you played this turn for each 9 of the lower of your Yin and Yang.
AdministrixMod:Transcension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replay the last Attack you played this turn for each !ax:M2! of the lower of your Yin and Yang.

AdministrixMod:Untouchable.NAME: Untouchable
AdministrixMod:Untouchable.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Dexterity, and lose !M! Dexterity at the end of this turn. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:Wuji.NAME: Wuji
AdministrixMod:Wuji.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Duality for each 4 of the lower of your Yin or Yang. NL Lose all of your Yin and Yang. NL Retain.
AdministrixMod:Wuji.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Duality for each 4 of the lower of your Yin or Yang. NL Lose half of your Yin and Yang, rounded down. NL Retain.

AdministrixMod:CastOffRegrets.NAME: Cast Off Regrets
AdministrixMod:CastOffRegrets.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Frail. NL Whenever you manually discard a card, gain !M! of the higher of your Yin and Yang.

AdministrixMod:Convergence.NAME: Convergence
AdministrixMod:Convergence.DESCRIPTION: Add a Daybreak and a Nightfall to your hand at the start of each turn.
AdministrixMod:Convergence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Daybreak and an upgraded Nightfall to your hand at the start of each turn.

AdministrixMod:HarmonicReverence.NAME: Harmonic Reverence
AdministrixMod:HarmonicReverence.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Affinity. NL Double both your Yin and Yang.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Affinity. NL Double both your Yang and Yin.

AdministrixMod:Overdrive.NAME: Overdrive
AdministrixMod:Overdrive.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain 4 Duality. NL Lose !M! Strength. NL Lose !M! Dexterity.
AdministrixMod:Overdrive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain 4 Duality. NL Gain [R]. NL Lose !M! Strength. NL Lose !M! Dexterity.

AdministrixMod:AmassedMasks.NAME: Amassed Masks
AdministrixMod:AmassedMasks.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack card, Skill card, and Power card into your hand. NL They all cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:AmassedMasks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack card, Skill card, and Power card into your hand, then upgrade them all. NL They all cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:BattleforgedBonds.NAME: Battleforged Bonds
AdministrixMod:BattleforgedBonds.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. Lose such at the end of this turn. NL Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:BattleforgedBonds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. Lose such at the end of this turn. NL Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

AdministrixMod:BrewingCloister.NAME: Brewing Cloister
AdministrixMod:BrewingCloister.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Obtain a random non-healing potion. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:FalseDeath.NAME: False Death
AdministrixMod:FalseDeath.DESCRIPTION: Discard your draw pile. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile ontop of your draw pile. NL Gain 3 Wilting. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:HopeInTheDark.NAME: Hope In The Dark
AdministrixMod:HopeInTheDark.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain Block equal to the amount of Yin you have more of than Yang. NL Remove all of your Debuffs.
AdministrixMod:HopeInTheDark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain Block equal to one and a half times the amount of Yin you have more of than Yang, rounded down. NL Remove all of your Debuffs.

AdministrixMod:LuminaryPath.NAME: Luminary's Path
AdministrixMod:LuminaryPath.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw cards and gain [R] equal to the difference between your Yin and Yang, divided by 10. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:LuminaryPath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw cards and gain [R] equal to the difference between your Yin and Yang, divided by !ax:M2!. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:Mastermind.NAME: Mastermind
AdministrixMod:Mastermind.DESCRIPTION: Double all Plot effects this turn and next turn. NL Transpose one. NL Draw 1 less card next turn. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:Mastermind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double all Plot effects this turn and next turn. NL Transpose two. NL Draw 1 less card next turn. NL Exhaust.

AdministrixMod:TenDesires.NAME: Ten Desires
AdministrixMod:TenDesires.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Transpose two. NL Draw cards until you have 10 in your hand. NL Discard 2 cards. NL Exhaust.
AdministrixMod:TenDesires.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Transpose two. NL Draw cards until you have 10 in your hand. NL Discard 2 cards.

AdministrixMod:DeathByGlamour.NAME: Death by Glamour
AdministrixMod:DeathByGlamour.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Rare card to your hand (which costs 0 that turn), and discard 1 card. NL Draw 1 less card each turn.
AdministrixMod:DeathByGlamour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Rare card to your hand (which costs 0 this combat), and discard 1 card. NL Draw 1 less card each turn.

AdministrixMod:FearOfDeath.NAME: Fear of Death
AdministrixMod:FearOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Frail. NL Gain 3 Wilting. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Discard your hand.

AdministrixMod:FaithfulFlames.NAME: Faithful Flames
AdministrixMod:FaithfulFlames.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 3 Attacks, gain !M! Thorns.
AdministrixMod:FaithfulFlames.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play 3 Attacks, gain !M! Thorns.

AdministrixMod:ImmortalClarity.NAME: Immortal Clarity
AdministrixMod:ImmortalClarity.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Add a copy of that card into your hand next turn. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Upgrade all Immortal cards in your hand for the rest of this combat. [#cc99ff]}[]
AdministrixMod:ImmortalClarity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Add a copy of that card into your hand each turn for the next !M! turns. NL [#cc99ff]{[] Plot: Upgrade all of your Immortal cards for the rest of this combat. [#cc99ff]}[]

AdministrixMod:StarSwordSoul.NAME: Star Sword Soul
AdministrixMod:StarSwordSoul.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Duality, 1 Affinity, and draw 1 additional card.
AdministrixMod:StarSwordSoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Duality, 1 Affinity, and draw 1 additional card. NL Retain.

AdministrixMod:WifeLightning.NAME: Wife's Lightning
AdministrixMod:WifeLightning.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 3 Attacks, gain !M! Plated Armor.
AdministrixMod:WifeLightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play 3 Attacks, gain !M! Plated Armor.

AdministrixMod:LastEntry.NAME: Last Entry
AdministrixMod:LastEntry.DESCRIPTION: Kept until cards are stable to keep this file is stable.
